title: 1 dead, 3 wounded in drive-by shooting in Humble area
content:
A woman died and three men were wounded in a drive-by shooting in northeast Houston late Wednesday night, according to the Houston Police Department.
The shooting happened about 11:40 p.m. outside a house in the 16000 block of Saybrook near Townsan in the Humble area.
Police said the four people were outside the home when a car pulled up and someone inside the vehicle fired gunshots at them.
A 20-year-old woman, whose name has not been released, died at the scene. Three men, between 20 and 30 years old, were wounded and were rushed to nearby hospitals. One of them was in critical condition but details of his injuries and the conditions of the other two men were not released.
Police said investigators were trying to piece together what led to the shooting. So far, they have no suspects in the case. No descriptions of a possible suspect or the vehicle were available.
Anyone with information in this case is urged to contact the HPD Homicide Division at 713-308-3600 or Crime Stoppers at 713-222-TIPS.
